data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Baoding, Hebei, China that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Baoding, Hebei, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Baoding, Hebei, China to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, help the 122,796 believers in Baoding to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Baoding, Hebei, China to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Baoding
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Baoding, Hebei, China.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Baoding, Hebei, China a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Baoding, Hebei, China humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.section_summary:
the county of Baoding, Hebei, China has a population of 1,618,700.

We estimate Baoding has 122,796 people who might know Jesus, 26,150 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,469,754 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Baoding, Hebei, China to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.
